Config.name: CCMFindEvents
Config.Param: INFILENAME Name of the input root file (must be an output of CCMConvertBinary2ROOT or similar code)
OUTFILENAME Name of the output root file
TRIGGER Only look at triggers with name passed. Options are: - BEAM - STROBE - LED and any combination of the three, like BEAM STROBE
HVOFFLIST List of the HV channels that are off. For 2019-2020 runs use $CCMINSTALL/mappings/hv_off_2019.csv
CALIBRATIONFILE Name of the calibration file to use For 2019-2020 runs use $CCMINSTALL/mappings/root_out_2019ledData_run179_legFix_integral_all_round4_.root
